author: gartung
body:
Requesting a pull to cms:master from gartung:gartung-comment-pull-request

Write a message for this pull request. The first block
of text is the title and the rest is the description.

Changes:

24b8efb (Patrick Gartung, 2 minutes ago)
   Rename comment-gh-pr comment-github-pullrequest in other scripts

92c0bc0 (Patrick Gartung, 16 minutes ago)
   Rename comment-gh-pr to comment-github-pullrequest. Move comment function
   to its own module comment_gh_pr.py that can be overridden in the repos
   directory.
title: Rename comment-gh-pr comment-github-pullrequest. Add comment_gh_pr.py. This allows custom comment_gh_pr module/function to be added to repos directory.  ------------------------ >8 ------------------------ # Do not modify or remove the line above. # Everything below it will be ignored.
